## Blueprints Definitions

<blueprint>
  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.
  Initiative has an number of associated artifacts you can read/write.
  Spec and plan are also artifacts.
  You can edit them if necessary.
  
    Initiative spec:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT89
      Keep a list of expenses in a markdown document (create artifact "Expenses").
  Process incoming emails, add the relevant ones to the list.
  
  Format:

# Shopping List

## Scrambled Eggs on Toast Ingredients

### For the eggs:
- [ ] Eggs (6-8 for multiple servings)
- [ ] Butter (for cooking)
- [ ] Milk or cream (optional, for creamier eggs)
- [ ] Salt
- [ ] Black pepper

### For the toast:
- [ ] Bread (your choice - white, whole wheat, sourdough, etc.)
- [ ] Butter (for spreading)

### Optional additions:
- [ ] Chives or green onions (for garnish)
- [ ] Cheese (cheddar, gruyere, or your preference)
- [ ] Hot sauce or ketchup
- [ ] Fresh herbs (parsley, dill, or basil)

tools.description: Updates the text artifact to have new content.

name.description: The name of the artifact to update.

content.description: The new content of the artifact.

content.content:
## Blueprints Definitions

<blueprint>
  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.
  Initiative has an number of associated artifacts you can read/write.
  Spec and plan are also artifacts.
  You can edit them if necessary.
  
    Initiative spec:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8J
      Keep a list of expenses in a markdown document (create artifact "Expenses").
  Process incoming emails, add the relevant ones to the list.
  
  Format:
  
  ## Expences
  
  - Flight to London (2026-02-01): 100
  - Hotel in London (2026-02-01): 100
  
    Initiative plan:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8K
  
  All artifacts:
      Spec: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8J
      Plan: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8K
      Expenses: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT9H
</blueprint>

## Context Objects

<object>

  <typename>dxos.org/type/Initiative</typename>
</object>

tools.name: create-or-update-artifact
tools.description: Updates the text artifact to have new content.

name.description: The name of the artifact to update.

content.description: The new content of the artifact.

content.content:
## Blueprints Definitions

<blueprint>
  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.
  Initiative has an number of associated artifacts you can read/write.
  Spec and plan are also artifacts.
  You can edit them if necessary.
  
    Initiative spec:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8H
      Keep a list of expenses in a markdown document (create artifact "Expenses").
  Process incoming emails, add the relevant ones to the list.
  
  Format:
  
  ## Expences
  
  - Flight to London (2026-02-01): 100
  - Hotel in London (2026-02-01): 100
  
    Initiative plan:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8J
  
  All artifacts:
      Spec: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8H
      Plan: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8J
      Expenses: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT9E
</blueprint>

## Context Objects

  <dxn>dxn:echo:BDJXMULPW5FB55UZ7KP5HLDHVTXUTHE2U:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8K</dxn>

</object>

tools.name: create-or-update-artifact
tools.description: Updates the text artifact to have new content.

name.description: The name of the artifact to update.

content.description: The new content of the artifact.

content.content:
## Blueprints Definitions

<blueprint>
  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.
  Initiative has an number of associated artifacts you can read/write.
  Spec and plan are also artifacts.
  You can edit them if necessary.
  
    Initiative spec:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8H
      Keep a list of expenses in a markdown document (create artifact "Expenses").
  Process incoming emails, add the relevant ones to the list.
  
  Format:
  
  ## Expences
  
  - Flight to London (2026-02-01): 100
  - Hotel in London (2026-02-01): 100
  
    Initiative plan:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8J
  
  All artifacts:
      Spec: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8H
      Plan: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8J
      Expenses: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT9E
</blueprint>

## Context Objects

<object>
  <dxn>dxn:echo:BDJXMULPW5FB55UZ7KP5HLDHVTXUTHE2U:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT8K</dxn>
  <typename>dxos.org/type/Initiative</typename>
</object>

## Blueprints Definitions

  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.

  You can edit them if necessary.
  
    Initiative spec:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT93
      Keep a list of expenses in a markdown document (create artifact "Expenses").
  Process incoming emails, add the relevant ones to the list.

  - Hotel in London (2026-02-01): 100

      Expenses: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNTA1

content.content:
## Blueprints Definitions

<blueprint>
  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.
  Initiative has an number of associated artifacts you can read/write.
  Spec and plan are also artifacts.
  You can edit them if necessary.
  
    Initiative spec:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT93
      Keep a list of expenses in a markdown document (create artifact "Expenses").
  Process incoming emails, add the relevant ones to the list.
  
  Format:
  
  ## Expences
  
  - Flight to London (2026-02-01): 100
  - Hotel in London (2026-02-01): 100
  
    Initiative plan:
      dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT94
  
  All artifacts:
      Spec: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT93
      Plan: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNT94
      Expenses: dxos.org/type/Text dxn:echo:@:01JGFJJZ00G0WKQSJGMAKCNTA1
</blueprint>
